title: Impressions from a first-time Mac user | Logan Marchione
description: TL;DR ⚠️ Warning Apple fanboys: this is a rant ⚠️ Hardware = Good Software = Bad Introduction I recently started a new job where my employer provided me with a brand-new 2021 16‑inch MacBook Pro. A little background on me: I’ve been using Windows and Linux my entire professional life, I have been daily-driving various Linux desktops at home for 10+ years, all of my servers run Linux, but I have never used a Mac in my life.
